MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock, affecting properties in Kempock Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.06am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault at Kempock Street substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.55am on Tuesday 2nd March 2021
